item.description:
Don't miss the film Camp Fema. The Camp Fema web site and movie trailer
can be found at: http://www.campfema.c...

Movie screening is at the Fairfield Public Library, upstairs in the Rotary Room, 2nd floor.
Copies of the movie will be available for purchase.

Fairfield Library is in the heart of Fairfield Center on the Post Road between exts 22 and 23 on I-95.

On street parking. Additional parking is available after 1 pm at:
Bank of America, 1366 Boston Post Road, and Chase Bank, 1401 Post Road.

Event coordinator is Rosie Haas, Committees of Safety
rosie@naturalneighborhood.com

Pass this meeting info on to everyone you know.

barbara g.
item.name: Camp FEMA Screening/Meeting for COS in Fairfield
